name: Bongaboard Tribal Mayan Sun God Tee
description:
This colourful 'Sun God' design is inspired by the Mayan Calendar and based on a tattoo style design.

Free 15cm vinyl car sticker with every Tee!

• Unisex Tees
• FAIR WEAR - No sweat shop production.
• 100% ​cotton. Gildan Super Premium.
​• High quality, pre shrunk garments.​
​• Inside back collar displays the printed 'Bonga' tag.
• Right outside displays the printed Bongaboard Spiral logo.
• Save the Environment, protect your print - wash cool & line dry.

SIZING:
Mens Small / Ladies Medium (8-10)
Armpit – Armpit : 49 cm
Shoulder – Shoulder : 44 cm
Neck – Waist (back length) : 67 cm​

Mens Medium / Ladies Large (10-12)
Armpit – Armpit : 52 cm
Shoulder – Shoulder : 48 cm
Neck – Waist (back length) : 70 cm

Mens Large / Ladies XL (12-14)
Armpit – Armpit : 55 cm
Shoulder – Shoulder : 50 cm
Neck – Waist (back length) : 71 cm

Mens XL / Ladies XXL (14-16)
Armpit – Armpit : 60 cm
Shoulder – Shoulder : 54 cm
Neckline – Waist (full length) : 74 cm
​
Fit : Regular (Unisex), ladies, it might be an idea to size down.

Postage is Royal Mail 2nd Class Signed for and can take up to 5 days.

name: Bongaboard Gecko Tee
description:
From Hawaii to the Zuni tribe of New Mexico, the chirpy Gecko is a symbol of good luck and change. Sacred in some cultures, many myths are associated with this most spectacular Lizard. With on eye on the future and one on the past, our lively coloured Gecko grips the shirt in this vibrant fun design.

Free 15cm vinyl car sticker with every Tee!

• Unisex Tees
• FAIR WEAR - No sweat shop production.

name: Bongaboard Koi and Lotus Tee
description:
Two magnificent symbols, the Koi Fish and the Lotus Flower, both rich in symbolism, legend, and meaning are brought together in this truly beautiful design. The strong and courageous Koi fish depicted in stunning golden hues, swims upstream in the face of adversity. In the water, three exquisite Lotus flowers sit in harmony, richly coloured petals, open to hope and new beginnings.

Free 15cm vinyl car sticker with every Tee!

• Unisex Tees
• FAIR WEAR - No sweat shop production.

name: Bongaboard Tribal Mayan Skull Tee
description:
The legends of The Mayan Skulls have endured for millennia, and are the inspiration for this Skull motif. Its bright, luminous colours and contemporary flavour, make this design one of my personnel favourites.

name: Bongaboard Tribal Sugar Skull Tee
description:
The symbol of the Skull was of great significance in many ancient cultures, and is celebrated in all its glory on The Mexican 'Day Of The Dead'. This colourful vivid Skull combines those influences with a Tribal Tattoo Art style.

Free 15cm vinyl car sticker with every Tee!
